"Hey, <%me>! Come here for a sec.":
"Take a look.
What a great view!"
"Everywhere in Kvaris is so pretty!"

"...Though I get mixed feelings when I realize this scenery
is all because of a past battle with Dark Falz..."

"Brrr! It sure is cold, though!
Must be 'cause we're so high up."

"Without these clothes, I probably
wouldn't be able to climb all the way up here."

"Manon said that if you activate your inner Photons,
it's actually not that cold... Or something like that."
"Yeah, cold is just cold to me."
"Where'd you get those clothes?"
"That's different from what you usually wear."
"Oh, Crawford gave these to me."
"...Actually, he told me my Dad had them made for me."
"Yeah, apparently it's something my Dad left behind for me."

"Crawford told me they'd
been kept safe in Central City."

"It seems my Dad had a lot of stuff in Central City
set up for me in case anything happened to him."

"I always figured he lived his life day-by-day,
but I guess he was really thinking about the long term."
"I only realized that just recently."

"If he had these clothes made for me, that means
he must've also predicted I would come here one day."

"He never taught me how to fight or anything,
but maybe one day he actually would have..."

"By the way, you're still dressed how you usually are.
Don't you ever get cold, <%me>?"
"Nah, not really."
"I'm just tough like that."
"Really?! Is that a Meteorn ability too?"
"That's kind of incredible."

"R-Right...
Well, just don't overdo it, okay?"

"...Anyways, I think I'm gonna go
look around the area a bit more."
"See you around!"
